errors.location-banned: Unfortunately, Nash is unable to operate in your jurisdiction at the moment.

errors.invalid-clock: To trade on Nash your clock must be accurate. <0>Sync your clock</0> then <1>try again</1>.
errors.network-issue: There is a temporary network issue. Please <0>try again</0>.
errors.generic-error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.generic-error-signout: An unexpected error occurred. Please sign out and try again.

password.incorrect: The password you entered was incorrect.

2fa.incorrect: The two-factor authentication code you entered is incorrect. You have a maximum of five attempts.
2fa.already-used: The two-factor authentication code you entered has already been used. Please wait and try again.
2fa.code-expired: The two-factor authentication code you entered has expired. Please wait and try again.
2fa.too-many-failures: You have entered an incorrect code too many times and your account is now permanently locked. Please contact support.
2fa.too-many-failures-signout: You have entered an incorrect code too many times and your account is now permanently locked. You will now be signed out.

cryptography.encryption-failed: Encryption failed. Please sign out and try again.
cryptography.decryption-failed: Decryption failed. Please sign out and try again.

pending.title: Your account is currently being processed!
pending.message: Please check back in a few minutes.

not-found.title: Your account could not be found.
